Player History
Injured on 9/19/1965 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 1965...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/4/1967 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Won World Series with Boston in 1968...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/2/1970 to a 2-year deal worth $1,900,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/11/1972 to a 3-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Drafted in 3rd round, 51st overall pick, by Oakland in 1975...
